sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update the workplace task type of space assist cases.</description>
        <name>Set workplace task type space request </name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateTaskTypeOfCase();

function updateTaskTypeOfCase() {
    var caseGr = new GlideRecord(WSDCaseConstants.TABLES.CASE);
    caseGr.addQuery('workplace_task_type', '');
    caseGr.addNotNullQuery('space_recommendation_mapping');
    caseGr.query();
    caseGr.setValue('workplace_task_type', 'space_request');
    caseGr.updateMultiple();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-23 09:38:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>c14dbe3ca3f121101af16d8246fcda01</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set workplace task type space request </sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a1bd5de60f751010784dd2d92f767e96</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c14dbe3ca3f121101af16d8246fcda01</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-23 11:54:01</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set workplace task type space request
